name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in cloud-native system deployment using **AWS**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Terraform**. Proficient in implementing CI/CD pipelines with **GitLab CI/CD**, and monitoring systems utilizing **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **InfluxDB**. Skilled in performance testing and load testing with tools like **Locust**, **Gatling**, and **K6**. Solid programming background in **Python** and **Bash**, and proficient in using **Java** for backend services.

Accomplished Full Stack Developer with extensive experience in delivering high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial sectors. Expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, and diverse frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in developing AI/ML-powered platforms that facilitate predictive analytics and automation. Strong understanding of compliance-driven development principles, ensuring alignment with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Well-versed in MLOps practices, focusing on model training, serving, and orchestration utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
